content: i made mine with 3 levels a square within a diamond within a square i used 5 colors of 7 oz skeins now the outermost color used almost all of 1 7 oz skein and the rest in decreasing amounts the skeins i used are 365 yds long the innermost color used hardly a third of that amount so plan your skeins accordingly i now speaking of sizes the finished size of mine using heavy worsted weight yarn and an i hook is about 36-38 square two such squares together would make a complete twin bed cover that being said the size can be anything you desire from a small hook 2 layer square that is tiled to make a larger piece to a larger hook and bulky yarn or rug yarn to make a floor throw try it a couple of ways and you may just end up with your own creation
